mutants.code:
def extract_top_10_rows(matrix):
    num_rows = len(matrix)
    num_cols = len(matrix[1])
    row_sums = []
    for row in matrix:
        row_sums.append(sum(row))
    top_10_indices = sorted(range(num_rows), key=lambda i: row_sums[i], reverse=True)[:10]
    top_10_matrix = []
    for index in top_10_indices:
        top_10_matrix.append(matrix[index])
    return top_10_matrix

def extract_top_10_rows(matrix):
    num_rows = len(matrix)
    num_cols = len(matrix[0])
    row_sums = []
    for row in matrix:
        row_sums.append(sum(row))
    top_10_indices = sorted(range(num_rows), key=lambda i: row_sums[i], reverse=False)[:10]
    top_10_matrix = []
    for index in top_10_indices:
        top_10_matrix.append(matrix[index])
    return top_10_matrix
